description: Allow clients to schedule appointments directly from your website.
name: Appointment Booking Form

steps.title: Book Your Appointment
steps.text: To book your appointment, please fill out the form below with the necessary details. This will help us ensure that we can accommodate your preferred time and service needs.

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Provide your email address to receive appointment confirmations and updates.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Enter your phone number for any necessary follow-up or reminders.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Appointment Date
blocks.help: Select the desired date and time for your appointment.
blocks.name: date_time

blocks.label: Service Required
blocks.help: Select the type of service you need from the available options.
blocks.name: services

blocks.label: Additional Notes
blocks.help: Optional: Provide any additional information or special requests for your appointment.
blocks.name: notes
